name: Drelbs
description:
In Drelbs, a set of randomly-arranged lines are already in place on the screen, and moving your character into contact with them pushes them in the direction of contact. Forming a complete square locks it into place, and it turns into a barrier. After a certain period of time, a monster may appear in a barrier which results in death if you make contact with it. After a little while the monster disappears taking the barrier with it.

After producing enough squares/barriers, one will randomly change into a stairway, which can lead you into a bonus room. Making things harder are the enemies which chase your character around the screen, again contact with these results in death.

This game is a free remake of the Commodore 64 game of the same name.

shot.caption: You must most the walls to create solid squares.
When all the squares have been made, look for the portal to open up and take you to the next screen.
Once through the portal, you have to rescue the other drelbs by running over them.
A brief animation plays before moving to the next level.
Starting the second level, now with two enemies.
